title: $:/plugins/dyp/Tags-drop-down-menu
author: dyp
name: Tags-drop-down-menu
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/PSaT/ViewToolbar2":{"title":"$:/PSaT/ViewToolbar2","created":"20200603044631721","creator":"dev","filename":"ViewToolbar2","modified":"20240407154633390","modifier":"dev","package-filter":"[prefix[$:/PSaT/ViewToolbar2]]","psat-project":"ViewToolbar2","tags":"标签下拉菜单","text":";Provides an additional location below the current View Toolbar to add buttons or other content :Simply tag a tiddler with <>"},"$:/PSaT/ViewToolbar2/viewTemplate":{"title":"$:/PSaT/ViewToolbar2/viewTemplate","created":"20200603035724582","creator":"dev","list-before":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle","modified":"20240408010916182","modifier":"dev","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate 标签下拉菜单","text":""},"$:/PSaT/add-tag-here":{"title":"$:/PSaT/add-tag-here","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-here-button}} Add tag here","created":"20220613014058062","creator":"simplify","description":"Add tag to current tiddler","list-before":"","modified":"20240415072908162","modifier":"Designer","note":"Can only occur when tag pill is displayed on the tiddler even when its not tagged","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown 标签下拉菜单","text":"<$list filter="[!tagthen]" variable=currentTag> <$tiddler tiddler=<> ><$fieldmangler> <$button tooltip="Add tag here" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param=<>/> {{$:/core/images/new-here-button}} Add <$macrocall $name=tag-pill tag=<>/> here. "},"$:/PSaT/close-all-tagged":{"title":"$:/PSaT/close-all-tagged","created":"20200529083114352","creator":"Designer","description":"","list-after":"","modified":"20240415073404775","modifier":"Designer","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown 标签下拉菜单","text":"<$button tooltip="关闭所有" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$list filter="[tag] -[]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> 关闭所有 "},"$:/PSaT/copy-tag":{"title":"$:/PSaT/copy-tag","caption":"{{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}} 复制标签","created":"20200114101105146","creator":"simplify","description":"Copy tag to clipboard from tag pill","modified":"20240416093741445","modifier":"Designer","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown 标签下拉菜单","text":"<$button tooltip="复制该标签文本内容" message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}} 复制该标签 "},"$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button":{"title":"$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button","created":"20220505064026354","creator":"!user","filename":"new-toc-tag-button","modified":"20240416093846053","modifier":"!user","package-filter":"[prefix[$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button]]","psat-project":"new-toc-tag-button","psat-version":"0.0.1","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown 标签下拉菜单","text":"\define source() <> <$button to="$(basetitle)$" tooltip="在故事河打开该目录" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button/open-image}}
<>
\end <$let tocTag=<> basetitle={{{ [] [[ - toc]] +[join[]] }}} > <$list filter="[!has[title]]" variable=~> <$button tooltip="以该标签新建侧边栏目录列表" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> caption=<> tags="$:/tags/SideBar" text=<> /> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} 新建目录列表 — <$text text=<>/> <$list filter="[has[title]]" variable=~><$button tooltip="打开已以该标签生成的目录列表" to=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button/toc-image}} 打开目录
"},"$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button/open-image":{"title":"$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button/open-image","created":"20220505074344317","modified":"20240407154633399","tags":"标签下拉菜单","text":""},"$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button/toc-image":{"title":"$:/PSaT/new-toc-tag-button/toc-image","created":"20220505075623186","image-source":"","modified":"20240407154633401","tags":"标签下拉菜单","text":""},"$:/PSaT/new-with-tag":{"title":"$:/PSaT/new-with-tag","created":"20200715020458744","creator":"Designer","description":"以该标签新建子条目","modified":"20240416093228049","modifier":"designer","psat-version":"0.0.2","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown 标签下拉菜单","tiddlywiki-version":"5.2.0+","text":"\define sqr-open() [[ \define sqr-close() ]] <$button tooltip="以该标签新建子条目" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> $savetitle="$:/temp/tiddlername"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/temp/tiddlername}} $field="tags" $value={{{ [format:titlelist[]] }}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{$:/temp/tiddlername}}/> {{$:/core/images/new-here-button}} 新建子条目 "},"$:/PSaT/open-all-tagged":{"title":"$:/PSaT/open-all-tagged","created":"20200529080909811","creator":"Designer","description":"","modified":"20240415071312313","modifier":"Designer","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown 标签下拉菜单","text":"<$button tooltip="打开所有筛选的条目" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$list filter="[tag]"> <$action-navigate $to=<> $scroll="no"/> 打开所有 "},"$:/PSaT/reimagin-tags":{"title":"$:/PSaT/reimagin-tags","created":"20200908091720089","creator":"Tony","filename":"reimagin-tags","modified":"20240407154633373","modifier":"!user","package-filter":"[prefix[$:/PSaT/reimagin-tags]] [prefix[$:/PSaT/add-tag-here]]","psat-project":"reimagin-tags","psat-version":"0.1.1","tags":"标签下拉菜单","wiki-name":"BlogToSelf","text":";Package of macros relating to tags : Used on tag pill dropdown see <>"},"$:/PSaT/reimagin-tags/registration":{"title":"$:/PSaT/reimagin-tags/registration","caption":"reimagin-tags","created":"20201012012456756","creator":"Tony","filename":"reimagin-tags","modified":"20240407154633376","modifier":"Tony","package-filter":"[prefix[$:/PSaT/reimagin-tags]] [perfix[$:/PSaT/new-with-tag]]","project-modified-date":"20201012012456756","project-registered-date":"20201012012456756","psat-project":"reimagin-tags","psat-version":"0.1.0","tags":"registered-project 标签下拉菜单","wiki-name":"BlogToSelf","text":"
Package of macros relating to tags
"},"$:/PSaT/remove-tag":{"title":"$:/PSaT/remove-tag","caption":"{{$:/core/images/close-button}} 移除标签","created":"20220504073709620","creator":"simplify","description":"移除当前条目该标签","list-before":"","modified":"20240415072807433","modifier":"Designer","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown 标签下拉菜单","text":"<$list filter="[tagthen]" variable=currentTag> <$tiddler tiddler=<> ><$fieldmangler> <$button tooltip="移除该标签" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param=<>/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} 移除该标签 <$tiddler>"},"$:/PSaT/tag-indicator":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tag-indicator","created":"20200908084011021","creator":"Tony","modified":"20240407154633378","modifier":"Tony","tags":"标签下拉菜单"},"$:/PSaT/tag-indicator/button":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tag-indicator/button","caption":"{{$:/core/images/tag-button}}","created":"20200908084044471","creator":"Tony","description":"Indicates if a tiddler is a Tag and the count of its use [[more|$:/PSaT/tag-indicator]]","modified":"20240407154857120","modifier":"Tony","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar 标签下拉菜单","text":""},"$:/PSaT/tag-indicator/tag-dropdown":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tag-indicator/tag-dropdown","caption":"{{$:/core/images/tag-button}}","created":"20200908091242441","creator":"Tony","description":"Indicates if a tiddler is a Tag and the count of its use [[more|$:/PSaT/tag-indicator]]","list-before":"","modified":"20240415074717462","modifier":"Tony","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown 标签下拉菜单","text":"<$list filter="[all[current]is[tag]]" variable=nul> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="该标签的子条目数"> 该标签有<$text text={{{ [tagcount[]] }}}/>个子条目 "},"$:/PSaT/tagging-here":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tagging-here","created":"20200603041057439","creator":"dev","modified":"20240407154633383","modifier":"dev","tags":"标签下拉菜单","text":";It is possible to use the following transculusions :`{{||$:/PSaT/tagging-here/pill}}` A Tag icon appears if there are any tiddlers tagging the current one :`{{||$:/PSaT/tagging-here/TagTemplate}}` A Tag icon appears always :`{{tiddlername||$:/PSaT/tagging-here/pill}}` A Tag icon appears if there are any tiddlers tagging //tiddlername// :`{{tiddlername||$:/PSaT/tagging-here/TagTemplate}}` A Tag icon appears always for //tiddlername// ;Please note: : The tiddler $:/PSaT/tagging-here/pill is already tagged $:/tags/ViewToolbar2 :and will be visible below the view toolbar if you have installed $:/PSaT/ViewToolbar2 "},"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/ListItemTemplate 1":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/ListItemTemplate 1","created":"20200605070045221","creator":"Designer","modified":"20240407154633387","modifier":"Designer","source":"","tags":"标签下拉菜单","text":"
<$link to={{!!title}}> <$view field="title"/>
"},"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/ListItemTemplate":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/ListItemTemplate","created":"20200603030344220","creator":"dev","modified":"20240407154633386","modifier":"Designer","source":"","tags":"标签下拉菜单","text":"<$link to={{!!title}}> <$view field="title"/> "},"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/TagTemplate":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/TagTemplate","created":"20200603030044209","creator":"dev","description":"Alternative Tag template transclude $:/PSaT/TagTemplate","modified":"20240407154633389","modifier":"dev","tags":"标签下拉菜单","text":"\define tag-pill-inner(tag,icon,colour:"#ffffff",fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB,element-tag,element-attributes,actions) <$vars foregroundColor=<> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> <$element-tag$ $element-attributes$ class="tc-tag-label tc-btn-invisible" style=<>> $actions$ {{$:/PSaT/tagging-here/images/tag}} \end \whitespace trim <$set name="transclusion" value=<>> <$macrocall $name="tag-pill-body" tag=<> icon={{!!icon}} colour={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}} element-tag="""$button""" element-attributes="""popup=<> dragFilter='[all[current]tagging[]]' tag='span'"""/> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-drop-down"> <$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/PSaT/tagging-here/ListItemTemplate"/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TagDropdown]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>
<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<>/> "},"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/images/tag":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/images/tag","created":"20200603034002772","creator":"dev","modified":"20240407154633384","modifier":"dev","source":"$:/core/images/new-here-button","tags":"$:/tags/Image 标签下拉菜单","text":""},"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/pill":{"title":"$:/PSaT/tagging-here/pill","created":"20200603023805476","creator":"dev","modified":"20240407154633388","modifier":"dev","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar2 标签下拉菜单","text":"<$list filter="[all[current]tagging[]limit[1]]" variable=nul> {{||$:/PSaT/tagging-here/TagTemplate}} "},"$:/plugins/dyp/Tags-drop-down-menu/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/Tags-drop-down-menu/history","created":"20250526074843445","modified":"20250526074939851","text":"; v.0.0.3 2025-06-25 # 修复新建子条目按钮，新条目标题命名格式为 `<>`； ; v.0.0.2 2025-05-26 # 修复系统下拉标签未对齐的问题； "},"$:/plugins/dyp/Tags-drop-down-menu/padding":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/Tags-drop-down-menu/padding","created":"20250526074315302","modified":"20250526074611643","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css","text":"a.tc-tiddlylink.tc-tiddlylink-missing { padding: 0 5px; }"},"$:/plugins/dyp/Tags-drop-down-menu/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/Tags-drop-down-menu/readme","created":"20250506152157802","modified":"20250506152212635","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; 标签下拉菜单"},"$:/tags/ViewToolbar2":{"title":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar2","created":"20200603053315919","creator":"dev","modified":"20240407154633382","modifier":"dev","tags":"标签下拉菜单","text":":Tag used to place items tagged with <> on a second Toolbar below the view toolbar :see $:/PSaT/ViewToolbar2"}}}
